name: Furries
description:
A Small island simulation game where you have to move around and hatch eggs which contain cute monsters called Furries.

This game was heavily inspired by Goodgis, so check him out on YouTube.

Instructions:

-A and D to move

-Space to jump

-"E" to open eggs

-Furries lay eggs and multiply

-Eggs take any time between 5 to 40 seconds to be opened, so wait until the egg shows an "E" icon over it.

Thanks for playing, remember to leave feedback
